title: Toncoin Price Surges: Will TON Hit $8.24 Again Soon?
text:
- Toncoin (TON) is currently trading at $3.36, showing a weekly gain of 6.38%.
- Analysts predict a bullish continuation, citing strong support near $7.35–$7.37.
- Forecasts suggest TON could exceed $8.24 in the coming months.
Toncoin (TON) is currently trading at $3.36, registering a 0.57% gain in the last 24 hours. Alongside the price action is the significant increase in trading volume, currently at $434.63 million, a strong 51.49% increase in daily trade. TON has gained 6.38% in the last seven days, registering strong market interest and stability amidst the volatility in the larger cryptocurrency market.
Market participants are closely monitoring TON’s consolidation pattern, especially following a substantial upward move. With trading momentum building, many investors are optimistic about a potential breakout in the near term.
Momentum Build-Up Hints at Major Rally
In a recent study by Token Talk, TON shows a classic bullish flag or pennant formation on the 4-hour chart, normally an indication of trend continuation. The token is presently supported in a key support area of $7.35 to $7.37, suggesting the potential for another upward surge should the level prove support.
Token Talk is predicting a successful breakout could spur a move back through the $7.45 to $7.50 range, potentially breaking through those levels should the momentum gain steam.
The current chart setup, along with continued support retention, is a good indication TON is entering a re-accumulation phase. These types of phases are typical precursors to significant price appreciation, so the token is priming for what analysts refer to as its “next parabolic leg.”

Toncoin Price Forecast Remains Bullish
Long-term predictions favor the belief that TON is set to keep gaining. DigitalCoinPrice estimates that Toncoin may transcend its earlier all-time high of $8.24 in the near term, targeting a target range of $6.56 to $7.38 before the end of the year. Past performance indicates that TON is back on the ascending course after falling below $4.78 earlier this year.
The Changelly forecast is even more upbeat, with 2024 projections for the TON price of between $10.24 and $11.25, and the approximate average trading price of around $12.25. While their July 2025 estimate is less exuberant, with TON being only in the range of $3.61 to $3.80, that could be short-term consolidation and not a longer-term trend reversal.
Market sentiment for the moment is therefore generally upbeat, with both technical indications and analyst expectations all pointing to a continued bull case for Toncoin. Traders and investors both continue to keep TON in their sights, hoping for confirmation of the next significant price move.
